subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Astana team will not let Alberto Contador defend his Tour de France title with another team.“There is no possibility of Contador riding with another team because, first and foremost, Alberto has said he is unable to do so and he knows that here we have done everything, and we will continue to do everything, with him in mind,” Johan Bruyneel, the team director, told the Spanish sports daily Marca.Tour organizers banned Astana from this year’s race after a number of doping controversies during the 2007 event. World cycling’s governing body said Wednesday that it would do all it could — including taking tour organizers to court — to allow Astana to compete at cycling’s most prestigious race.
